configboolean.name: allow_folders
configboolean.desc: Should we allow users to use folders at all? NOTE: setting this to false will mean there is no place to save sent-mail or postponed messages, along with the obvious affects of restricting the user to their INBOX.

configstring.name: alternate_login
configstring.desc: If this is not false, it is assumed to be the URL of an alternate login screen which will be used in place of MIMP's default one.

configstring.name: redirect_on_logout
configstring.desc: If this is not false, it is assumed to be the URL of an alternate logout page which users will be sent to when they log out.

configenum.name: server_list
configenum.desc: Should we display a list of servers (defined in config/servers.php) for users to choose from? The options are 'shown', 'hidden', and 'none'. If the server list is hidden then you can use the 'preferred' mechanism to auto-select from it based on an HTTP virtualhost or another piece of data. If it is shown, the user will be able to pick from any of the options. If none, no server list will be shown and the defaults will be used unless another mechanism changes them.

configboolean.name: change_server
configboolean.desc: If we are not using the server list, should we allow users to type in a mail server?

configboolean.name: change_port
configboolean.desc: If we are not using the server list, should we allow users to select the mail server's port?

configboolean.name: change_protocol
configboolean.desc: If we are not using the server list, should we allow users to select the mail server's protocol?

configinteger.name: max_from_chars
configinteger.desc: In the mailbox view, we will chop off From: addresses longer than this value.

configinteger.name: max_subj_chars
configinteger.desc: In the mailbox view, we will chop off Subjects longer than this value.

configboolean.name: prepend_header
configboolean.desc: Should we include the contents of mimp/config/header.txt in the headers of every message sent?

configboolean.name: append_trailer
configboolean.desc: Should we append the contents of mimp/config/trailer.txt to the end of every message sent?

configstring.name: words
configstring.desc: If filtering of message content is turned on, where should we find the list of words to filter out?

configstring.name: replacement
configstring.desc: What should we replace filtered words with?

configboolean.name: use_vfs
configboolean.desc: Should we use the Horde VFS system for storing attachments (used when forwarding messages with attachments)?

configboolean.name: allow_cc
configboolean.desc: Should we allow users to set the Cc: header?

configboolean.name: allow_bcc
configboolean.desc: Should we allow users to set the Bcc: header?

configboolean.name: vinfo
configboolean.desc: Should we use a custom virtual users hook? If so, make sure you define _mimp_hook_vinfo() in horde/config/hooks.php. The hook will be used to set $mimp['user'] at login time. There are examples in horde/config/hooks.php.dist.

configboolean.name: trailer
configboolean.desc: Should we use a custom function to set the trailer text (if trailer text is appended to outgoing messages)? If so, make sure you define _mimp_hook_trailer() in horde/config/hooks.php. The function will be used to modify the trailer at runtime. There are examples in horde/config/hooks.php.dist.
